tool_description: Extract texts from images with very high accuracy and supports all languages of the earth.
title: OCR - Extract text

api_list.name: Extract text from image url
api_list.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

utterances.utterance: Extract text from this image: https://example.com/image1.jpg
Can you extract the text from this PNG image? https://example.com/image2.png
Please extract text from the following JPEG image: https://example.com/image3.jpeg
Extract text from this image URL: https://example.com/image4.jpg
What text is in this image? https://example.com/image5.png
Extract text from this image: https://example.com/image6.jpg
Can you extract the text from this image? https://example.com/image7.png
Please extract text from this JPEG image: https://example.com/image8.jpeg
Extract text from this image URL: https://example.com/image9.jpg
What text is in this image? https://example.com/image10.png

api_list.name: Extract text from image file

api_list.name: Extract text from image file
api_list.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

utterances.utterance: Extract the text from this JPEG image.
Can you extract the text from this PNG file?
